settings.heading: We have the tea on hair extensions...
settings.description: If you're curious about getting those elongated, luscious locks you've always dreamed of, hair extensions might just be the perfect solution for you! They work wonders for anyone who has trouble growing out their hair, experiencing hair loss, or has naturally has thin hair. Read below to see our FAQs on hair extensions.

settings.heading: What type of hair extensions do you offer?
settings.description:
Ultra Narrow Clip In extensions offer a premium solution for hair enhancement, crafted exclusively
with 100% human Remy hair, ensuring natural movement and seamless blending with your own hair. Renowned for their ultra-thin design, they stand as the most comfortable clip-in extensions available, comfortably laying flat against the scalp for a virtually undetectable look. With the ability to instantly add length and volume, these extensions provide a transformative effect without compromising on comfort or damaging your natural hair, making them a reliable choice for a stunning, effortlessly enhanced hairstyle.

Aura hair extensions offers effortless fitting, application, and removal, ensuring a seamless addition to your hair routine. Instantly achieving captivating length and volume without damaging your hair, this extension boasts various invisible wire options, to fit your crown perfectly. What sets "Aura" apart is its detachable velcro clips, providing extra stability to prevent any slippage, ensuring a secure and confident wear all day long.

Our Ponytails are made with 100% human Remy hair, ensuring unparalleled quality and a seamless blend with your natural hair. Elevate your style effortlessly by adding both length and luxurious thickness to your ponytail, enhancing your look in an instant.

settings.heading: How many grams are your hair extensions?
settings.description:
Ultra Narrow Clip Ins weigh:

  • 18in - 140 grams
  • 20in - 180 grams
  • 22in - 220 grams
  • 24in - 240 grams
  • 26in - 320 grams

Auras weigh:

  • 16in - 140 grams
  • 20in - 160 grams
  • 24in - 180 grams

Ponytails weigh:

  • 16in - 100 grams
  • 20in - 120 grams
  • 24in - 140 grams

settings.heading: How long do AquaLyna hair extensions last?
settings.description:
The lifespan of hair extensions can vary based on factors such as how well they are cared for, the products used on them, and how frequently they are worn. By following proper care instructions and wearing them regularly, hair extensions can last for years with proper care.

Click here to learn more!

settings.heading: How do I install my extensions?
settings.description: Please see all hair extension install tutorials here

settings.heading: Do you offer color matching?
settings.description: Yes, follow the instructions on this page to get your perfect shade!

settings.heading: How many pieces of hair will I get?
settings.description:
Auras are our halo option that have one piece of hair with detachable velcro clips included.

Ponytails have 1 piece, the ponytail and a connected strip of hair to wrap around the base of the ponytail.

Clip Ins have 7 pieces total to give complete customization on placement.

settings.heading: What are 'Aura' hair extensions?
settings.description: "Aura" extensions are comfortable halo extensions that have an almost invisible wire to fit your crown perfectly. They also feature detachable velcro clips, providing extra stability to prevent any slippage.

settings.heading: How do I apply a promotion or discount?
settings.description:
1. Add all items to the cart that qualify for that promotion.

2. Click on the shopping cart icon to check out.

3. Enter the discount or promotion in the "Discount Code" box, then click apply.

settings.heading: Do extensions have any maintenance?
settings.description: Yes, but not an much as professionally installed extensions. This article can answer those questions more in-depth.

settings.heading: What are your shipping details?
settings.description:
Free Ground Shipping (3-5 Business Days)

2-Day Shipping (2nd Business Day by 8:00pm) is $12.00

and Overnight (Next Business Day by 8:00pm) is $25.00.
